lis=[1]*250
count=2

def fib(y):
	global count
	a=lis[count-2]
	b=lis[count-1]
	while(b<=y):
		mr=a
		a=b
		b=mr+b
		lis[count]=b
		count=count+1


while(True):
	x=raw_input();
	ab=x.split()
	a=int(ab[0])
	b=int(ab[1])
	if (a==0 and b==0):
		break;
	fib(b)
	i=0
	while(True):
		if(lis[i]>=a):
			j=i
			c=0
			while(lis[j]<=b):
				c=c+1
				j=j+1
			print c
			break;
		i=i+1
